item.title: Adara add a quote by Fyodor Dostoyevsky
item.description: "People speak sometimes about the "bestial" cruelty of man, but that is terribly unjust and offensive to beasts, no animal could ever be so cruel as a man, so artfully, so artistically cruel." -- Fyodor Dostoyevsky

item.title: Adara add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "Confidence is ignorance. If you're feeling cocky, it's because there's something you don't know." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Adara add a quote by Melissa Marr
item.description: "What does it mean when nightmares dream of peace? When shadows wish for light?" -- Melissa Marr

item.title: Adara add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Making love with a woman and sleeping with a woman are two separate passions, not merely different but opposite. Love does not make itself felt in the desire for copulation (a desire that extends to an infinite number of women) but in the desire for shared sleep (a desire limited to one woman)." -- Milan Kundera
